original_title: Naked and Funny Special 4. Sexy Crazy Models
overview: What do you do if you’re a smokin’ hot model with a wicked sense of humor? Well, you get together with twenty or thirty of your hottest model friends, grab some hidden cameras, and GO CRAZY! Don’t delay, order right away and spend some supersexy, superfunny, supernaked time with our awesome “Naked & Funny: Sexy Crazy Models”!
title: Naked and Funny Special 4. Sexy Crazy Models
